t: Amazon's Treasure Truck sells deals out of the back of a truck
s: June 30, 2018 - In 25 U.S. cities, as well as in the U.K., Amazon runs a promotion called the Treasure Truck. Its a truck that visits multiple locations around a city and sells just one product a day at a discount.

t: Treasure Truck - Wikipedia
s: November 17, 2024 - The first Treasure Truck was released in Amazon's hometown of Seattle in June 2015. Initially, Treasure Truck offered one item at a time, which customers ordered using the Amazon app and picked up at a designated location the same day.
